thumb.name: Look What I Got You Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMom.%3Cbr%3EFor Mother's Day.%3Cbr%3EI got you a card%3Cbr%3Ewith something%3Cbr%3Ereally great inside...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EME!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Devon!

thumb.name: Someone We Love Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomething Special%3Cbr%3Efor You.%3Cbr%3EMom.%3Cbr%3Efrom Sam and Sarah%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're someone very special.%3Cbr%3Esomeone very dear.%3Cbr%3ESomeone we appreciate%3Cbr%3Eand love more every year...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're someone%3Cbr%3Ewho should always have%3Cbr%3Elife's very nicest things.%3Cbr%3EAnd that's the very special wish%3Cbr%3Eour loving message brings.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day
